name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Marketing Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications and marketing solutions. Expertise in **Python**, **Node.js**, and REST API development, integrating advanced analytics into customer engagement tools. Proficient in handling marketing automation platforms such as **Customer.io**, **HubSpot**, **Make.com**, **Zapier**, **Segment**, and analytics tools like **Mixpanel**, **PostHog**, and **GA4**. Strong skills in data visualization and reporting with **Looker Studio** and comprehensive experience in using **Google Tag Manager** for effective tracking. 

Demonstrated ability to deploy cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring robust integration with microservices and event-driven architectures. Skilled in applying compliance-driven approaches for marketing strategies, while leveraging **OpenAI** and **Claude** for innovative solutions. Deep understanding of AI/ML frameworks includes proficiency in model orchestration with **LangChain**, **CrewAI**, and **AutoGen**. 

Recognized for delivering impactful results across healthcare and financial industries, driven by a solid foundation in front-end and back-end development using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django** among others.
